request_ip.title: Request IP
request_ip.description: The IP (e.g. of your ESP32) to which the request will be sent (e.g. '192.168.0.2')

path.title: Path
path.description: The path of the request (e.g. 'my-path'). Example: If the IP is set to '192.168.0.1' and the path is set to 'my-path', the request will be sent to 'http://192.168.0.1/my-path'
